Topic.Title: No rooms show when starting up Multiplayer

Posts.EditableText:
I'm sure this is a really dumb question but I can create rooms and see them in single player mode but if I switch to Multiplayer (or create a new multiplayer game from scratch) I see absolutely nothing when I run the game. Not even an error message. If I quit and change back to single player then run again I see the rooms fine and can move around.

I'm guessing theres some kind of config I have to do for Quest Server to work locally on my machine but I can't see anything obvious in the help files. I'm on Win XP Pro using QDK Lite. 

Any ideas?
Posts.HTML:
I'm sure this is a really dumb question but I can create rooms and see them in single player mode but if I switch to Multiplayer (or create a new multiplayer game from scratch) I see absolutely nothing when I run the game. Not even an error message. If I quit and change back to single player then run again I see the rooms fine and can move around.

I'm guessing theres some kind of config I have to do for Quest Server to work locally on my machine but I can't see anything obvious in the help files. I'm on Win XP Pro using QDK Lite.

Any ideas?

Posts.EditableText: OK I figured this one out eventually. I needed to add localhost as the server address in Quest then it works fine.
Posts.HTML: OK I figured this one out eventually. I needed to add localhost as the server address in Quest then it works fine.
